segments.text: Ugh, that sink is disgusting with water pouring out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is gross, spreading filth everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman’s shoe is soaked in that nasty mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she’s just standing there, clueless about the slime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing with dirty hands into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool’s wobbling in the wet spot; how unhygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water dripping down the cabinets looks revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plate she’s drying might get splashed with yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl’s reaching up, probably getting crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside seems clean, unlike this pigsty inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand the carelessness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
